programme.title: Kopitiam Days
programme.desc: Kopitiam Days, which showcases six stories about reconnecting and mending relationships. They span different time periods from the past, the present and the future and all revolve around a kopitiam, which is a local coffee joint where people gather for local food and beverages.

programme.title: The Streets, Hong Kong - EP 2
programme.desc: Over this eight-part series, renowned chef, Dan Hong will explore every corner of Hong Kong, learning about its history and culture and how this has shaped the local food scene. programme.title: Cobra: Rebellion S3 - EP 1

If a contestant can successfully make it through the first 9 songs without missing a SINGLE lyric, they'll have the chance to play a 10th and final song for a shot at ONE MILLION DOLLARS!

programme.title: Celebrity Catch Phrase S10 - EP 4

programme.title: KUTUKLAH AKU DENGAN CINTAMU
programme.desc: A village girl who, for some reason, seems to be "cursed" with an aura that always makes her LOSE in everything, from competitions to neighborhood council elections, so no one wants to get close to her. She is told to approach Elang, a thug who always wins in fights, in order to lose. Unexpectedly, Elang ends up falling in love with Matahari.

programme.title: DEWI RINDU - EP 50
programme.desc: Dewi is a girl with big dreams. She is determined to become successful and lift her family out of economic hardship. But who would have thought that her beautiful dream would be shattered and she would have to face the bitter reality of being pregnant out of wedlock.

programme.title: Circle Abang Cilok Mood Banget
programme.desc: Bang Toyib (Masaji Wijayanto) is constantly harassed by Sumi (Shanice Margaretha). Sumi lies to her father, claiming she is pregnant and that Bang Toyib got her pregnant. However, Bang Toyib continues to deny that he never got Sumi pregnant.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 504
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: CINTA MULIA - EP 30
programme.desc: A story of friendship since their school days, Mulia and Satria were inseparable friends as time went by, and seeds of love began to grow between them. Mulia and Satria had to suppress their feelings because they both had girlfriends.

programme.title: KUPINANG KAMU DENGAN DISUNAT
programme.desc: Hafizah (Larasati Nugroho) saves a man who has been pickpocketed. Because she helped him sincerely, Hafizah refuses to accept any money as a token of her gratitude. Hafizah, who doesn't want to be matched with Rafael, is told to bring a handsome and wealthy boyfriend like Rafael. Confused, Hafizah asks the man who was pickpocketed to use his son, Gio (Rendy Kjaernett), as her pretend boyfriend.

programme.desc: Fira (Yasmin Napper) is extremely stressed because her family is bankrupt and she has to work on her grandfather's chicken farm. Erwin actually has a phobia of chickens, but to gain Grandma's trust, Erwin is forced to do it. Fira and Erwin also often fight.

However, strangely, Nadia (Yunita Siregar), Lionil's younger sister, sells goods on the roadside and is constantly caught in raids. Lionil asks Nadia to stop, but she insists on being independent and succeeding in business at her young age.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 505
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: CINTA MULIA - EP 31
programme.desc: A story of friendship since their school days, Mulia and Satria were inseparable friends as time went by, and seeds of love began to grow between them. Mulia and Satria had to suppress their feelings because they both had girlfriends.

programme.title: KUTUNGGU JOMBLONYA SI RATU AYAM
programme.desc: Fira (Yasmin Napper) is extremely stressed because her family is bankrupt and she has to work on her grandfather's chicken farm. At the chicken farm, Fira meets Erwin (Ridho Ilahi), who is assigned to find chickens for his restaurant. Erwin actually has a phobia of chickens, but to gain Grandma's trust, Erwin is forced to do it. Fira and Erwin also often fight.

programme.title: DEWI RINDU - EP 51
programme.desc: Dewi is a girl with big dreams. She is determined to become successful and lift her family out of economic hardship. But who would have thought that her beautiful dream would be shattered and she would have to face the bitter reality of being pregnant out of wedlock.

programme.title: Begitu Syulit Merazia Cintamu
programme.desc: Lionil (Andrew Andika) works as a Public Order Agency (Satpol PP) officer. However, strangely, Nadia (Yunita Siregar), Lionil's younger sister, sells goods on the roadside and is constantly caught in raids. Lionil asks Nadia to stop, but she insists on being independent and succeeding in business at her young age.

programme.title: KUTUKLAH AKU DENGAN CINTAMU
programme.desc: A village girl who, for some reason, seems to be "cursed" with an aura that always makes her LOSE in everything, from competitions to neighborhood council elections, so no one wants to get close to her. She is told to approach Elang, a thug who always wins in fights, in order to lose. Unexpectedly, Elang ends up falling in love with Matahari.

programme.title: DEWI RINDU - EP 51
programme.desc: Dewi is a girl with big dreams. She is determined to become successful and lift her family out of economic hardship. But who would have thought that her beautiful dream would be shattered and she would have to face the bitter reality of being pregnant out of wedlock.

programme.title: Circle Abang Cilok Mood Banget
programme.desc: Bang Toyib (Masaji Wijayanto) is constantly harassed by Sumi (Shanice Margaretha). Sumi lies to her father, claiming she is pregnant and that Bang Toyib got her pregnant. However, Bang Toyib continues to deny that he never got Sumi pregnant.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 505
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: KUPINANG KAMU DENGAN DISUNAT
programme.desc: Hafizah (Larasati Nugroho) saves a man who has been pickpocketed. Because she helped him sincerely, Hafizah refuses to accept any money as a token of her gratitude. Hafizah, who doesn't want to be matched with Rafael, is told to bring a handsome and wealthy boyfriend like Rafael. Confused, Hafizah asks the man who was pickpocketed to use his son, Gio (Rendy Kjaernett), as her pretend boyfriend.

programme.title: CINTA MULIA - EP 32
programme.desc: A story of friendship since their school days, Mulia and Satria were inseparable friends as time went by, and seeds of love began to grow between them. Mulia and Satria had to suppress their feelings because they both had girlfriends.

programme.title: LIONTIN AJAIB WHICH IS PEMBAWA JODOH
programme.desc: At a hospital or clinic, Rangga and Intan met, and fell in love at first sight. At the clinic, Rangga only had one pimple checked (he felt overwhelmed because there was a pimple growing on his face) while Intan took her sick father. Well, because Intan's driver was stuck in traffic, finally Rangga was kind enough to take Intan and her father, even when they arrived at the luxurious house, Rangga also helped his father get into a wheelchair and took him inside.

programme.title: DEWI RINDU - EP 52
programme.desc: Dewi is a girl with big dreams. She is determined to become successful and lift her family out of economic hardship. But who would have thought that her beautiful dream would be shattered and she would have to face the bitter reality of being pregnant out of wedlock.

programme.title: Pesona Kulimu Mengalihkan Duniaku
programme.desc: While the resort is being renovated, Prilly (Ina Marika) meets a handsome porter named Bara (Ridho Illahi). Prilly is captivated by his handsomeness. However, many people mock her for her lack of taste.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 506

programme.desc: Azreen dan Harris terpaksa berkahwin apabila adik mereka melarikan diri pada malam sebelum bernikah. Adakah perkahwinan Harris dan Azreen akan berkekalan selepas Roadtrip Misadventures mereka?

programme.title: NoYa - EP 7

programme.title: Destinasi Ke Destinasi - EP 12

programme.title: Skrin Komedia: Tuyul Ke London - EP 4

programme.desc: Saksikan selebriti popular merancang "prank" bersama geng mereka dan mengenakan mangsa terpilih. Berjayakan perancangan "prank" mereka? Sama-sama kita nantikan!

programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan " Stand Up Comedy " gabungan antara Malaysia dan Indonesia.

programme.title: Opera Sabun Boboi - EP 11
programme.desc: Pertunjukan komedi lakaran yang memaparkan kemasyhuran pelawak Afdlin Shauki dan Harun Salim Bachik dari Boboi.

programme.title: Sepahtu Reunion Live 2024 - EP 8
programme.desc: Nantikan sketsa yang lebih lucu dengan kemunculan tetamu istimewa,dan cameo yang bakal menghiburkan anda semua.

programme.title: My Sweet RT - EP 2
programme.desc: Mengisahkan seorang wanita bernama Mona. Dia adalah wanita yang suka motosikal, dan juga suka bertengkar, jadi dia digelar wanita yang kuat.

programme.title: Isteri Halal - EP 62
programme.desc: Kerana kepenatan bekerja, Zayn hampir pengsan. Maria risau kerana Mak Pah sudah mula menyiasat tentang identitinya yang sebenar. Maria cuba memecat Adellia daripada bekerja di Synergy.

programme.title: Naluri Hati - EP 19
programme.desc: Pada hari perkahwinannya, Dinda teragak-agak kerana dia akan berkahwin dengan orang yang tidak dicintainya. Namun, satu kejadian berlaku dan menyebabkan Dinda mengalami amnesia separa.

programme.title: RASA Projek Gerenti Jadi - EP 3
programme.desc: Majalah masakan di Malaysia kini di kaca televisyen anda memaparkan resepi - resepi menarik setiap minggu yang dihoskan oleh Norzaini Abdul Halim (Aunty Aini) bersama - sama Adam Mahamed Ismail.

programme.title: The House: Ezurin Khyra - EP 2
programme.desc: The House menampilkan Ezurin Khyra yang sering menjadi sorotan kerana imej glamornya. Program ini juga menayangkan keperibadian ibu kepada lima orang cahaya mata ini yang tidak diketahui umum.

programme.title: Pengantin Lelaki Untuk Cik Gadis - EP 21
programme.desc: Kecewa dengan impian untuk bergelar tentera, Kris al-Hadi ke ladang Tok Abah. Pertemuan dengan Salsabila, gadis malang yang difitnah hingga terpenjara telah menimbulkan rasa simpati dan cinta.

programme.title: Sesat - EP 12
programme.desc: Sesat, rancangan yang menguji minda dan ikhtiar hidup selebriti tempatan dalam mencari destinasi yang ditetapkan.

programme.title: 3 Campur 2 - EP 7
programme.desc: Kisah sebuah keluarga yang mempunyai lima adik beradik tiri. Ayahnya mempunyai tiga orang anak dan isteri baru mempunyai dua orang anak yang nakal. Timbul pelbagai konflik dan komedi dalam cerita ini.

programme.title: Keluarga Iskandar S2 - EP 5
programme.desc: Seorang ibu yang tegas dan penyayang bernama Mak Jah yang berusaha sedapa upaya untuk menyatukan anak-anak, menantu dan cucu-cucunya yang dilanda perpecahan.

programme.title: Indonesian Street Food - EP 5
programme.desc: Separa dokumentari yang meneroka tentang masakan makanan jalanan di seluruh Indonesia

programme.title: You Must Be Joking
programme.desc: Terperangkap dalam rutin peribadi dan profesional, seorang penghuni New York yang lesu mendapat inspirasi untuk meneruskan cinta lama yang telah ditinggalkannya iaitu lawak berdiri di hadapan penonton.

programme.title: Roda Panas S2 - EP 1

programme.title: Les Quiquoi - EP 6

programme.desc: This second chapter looks back at the history of infectious diseases and notably the story of Armand Frappier. programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week.

programme.title: Le Gout Des Rencontres En Nouvelle-Aquitaine
programme.desc: Exploring rural land and culinary traditions! Chef Justine Piluso criss-crosses Nouvelle-Aquitaine to meet men and women in the region to learn about their products, their tastes and the dishes that they prepare.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete on arrow-word grids that they try to fill in by finding the answers to the given clues. But to access the clues, they must first answer questions with a very particular characteristic: the answer is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Une Brique Dans Le Ventre
programme.desc: In addition to the houses, apartments and lofts of various styles and prices which Cedric Wautier shows us through his many visits, this programme about homes offers legal, practical, technical, energy and aesthetic advice, without forgetting the part about the all-important DIY ''tricks''.

programme.title: Comment Ca Va Le NordÂ ? - EP 4
programme.desc: Food security for the people of the North is today being affected by climate change as it endangers certain traditions such as hunting, fishing, trapping and gathering. A population that will soon find itself increasingly dependent on deliveries from the south.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'est Dans La Boite ! - EP 26
programme.desc: Every day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box on the set. But what does it contain? It's always a surprising object that leads them to discover very different subjects: turtles, bowling or even cloud formation.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus - EP 29
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Yetili - EP 42
programme.desc: Nina and Leon, two little mice, live in a bookshop whose mascot is a large yeti cuddly toy called Yetili. Each evening, once the bookshop has closed, Yetili comes to life and settles his two friends on his knees to read them a story.

programme.title: Les Quiquoi - EP 7
programme.desc: Olive, Petole, Boulard, Mixo, Raoul and Pamela make up a full-of-fun gang known as the Quiquoi. Together they ask a host of existential questions, using drawings to find the answers. In their own quirky way, they love nothing better than creating surrealist worlds where everything becomes possible.

programme.title: Roi Keita - EP 5
programme.desc: The entire empire is on alert: Soundiata Keita's mother has been kidnapped. Abdul, as thirsty for power as ever, heads to the city of the sacred baobab trees.

programme.title: Roi Keita - EP 6
programme.desc: The entire empire is on alert: Soundiata Keita's mother has been kidnapped. Abdul, as thirsty for power as ever, heads to the city of the sacred baobab trees.

programme.title: Tout Le Monde Veut Prendre Sa Place
programme.desc: The game where everyone wants to be a winner. One quiz, six candidates and, comfortably installed in his chair, one champion... whom everyone dreams of unseating!

programme.title: La Fabuleuse Histoire Des Sciences Au Quebec - EP 3
programme.desc: In 1943 a secret laboratory was created at the University of Montreal to conduct research into atomic batteries. It remained operational until 1945. At the time, research into nuclear physics was directed towards helping the war effort.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Les ChefsÂ ! - EP 4
programme.desc: The brigade is divided into three teams, and the members of each trio face off by cooking the same fish. During the challenge, an extra ingredient appears and changes everything.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (1 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: Les Cyclades
programme.desc: As teenagers, Blandine and Magalie were inseparable. When they meet again, several years later, they decide to finally take the trip they'd always dreamed of: to Greece! The only problem is that the two former friends now have very different approaches to life... and holidays!

programme.title: Bien Vivre En France - EP 11
programme.desc: Ilet a Bourse, nestling in the heart of the Cirque of Mafate, is steeped in family lore. A hamlet where several generations grew up together and where few have ever wanted to leave. In harmony with nature, the locals live thanks to a system of mutual help and solidarity.

programme.title: Le Grand Echiquier - EP 6
programme.desc: In the prestigious setting of the Royal Opera of Versailles, an exceptional program dedicated to Charles Aznavour, a monument of French chanson and a cultural ambassador throughout the world. A look back at his childhood, his difficult beginnings, his years alongside edith Piaf, his major successes, his commitments, and his legacy...

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Andrew Van Zyl vs. Champion Dalcha
programme.desc: This episode features main event Andrew 'One Gear' Van Zyl vs. Champion Dalcha for the heavyweight title. From EFC71 in Carnival City, Johannesburg, South Africa on 23-June-2018.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Nate Campbell vs. Ali Funeka
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features lightweights Nate Campbell, aka 'The Galaxy Warrior', (32-1, 25 KOs) vs. Ali 'Rush Hour' Funeka (30-1, 25 KOs) from the BankAtlantic Center in Sunrise, Florida, USA, on February 14, 2009 in a bout viewed on television by 1.2 million.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Deandre Latimore vs. Carlos Quintana
programme.desc: This episode features Carlos Quintana's penultimate bout, as he fights Deandre Latimore, in a light middleweight title contest, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: BWF Martial Arts
programme.desc: Featuring Boy's CMX Form and Weapons at the ISKA US Open from Disney World, Orlando, FL.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Carlos Baldomir vs. Vernon Forrest
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Carlos Baldomir and Vernon Forrest facing off to determine the new WBC super welterweight world champion, a fight that earns both fighters an ovation at the end.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 3 featuring Asanoyama, Tochiozan, Hokutofuji and Ishiura from the Nagoya basho, 2018.

programme.title: World Karate Federation
programme.desc: The highest level of competition in the sport of karate anywhere in the world will take place from Budapest, Hungary, as the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS take place. Don't miss the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS, only on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Sergio Martinez vs. Paul Williams II
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features a WBC middleweight title bout between Sergio 'Maravilla' Martinez (45-2, 24 KOs) and Paul 'The Punisher' Williams (39-1, 27 KOs) from Boardwalk Hall in Atlantic City, New Jersey, USA, on November 20, 2010.

programme.title: XMA
programme.desc: In this episode, we learn about how the use of motion animation technology can help martial artists learn more efficient ways to put extra power behind their punches and kicks.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best judo of the World Team Championships from Budapest, where we will see history made as it's the first time a new mixed gender team format will be seen.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Bernard Hopkins vs. Winky Wright
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a light heavyweight title contest featuring 47-4-1 Bernard Hopkins and the 51-3-1 Winky Wright, who has not lost a bout in over seven years.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 4 featuring Ikioi, Tamawashi, Takakeisho, and Yoshikaze from the Nagoya basho, 2018.

programme.title: Macho: The Hector Camacho Story
programme.desc: This series takes a hard-hitting look at the rise, fall and untimely death of one of boxing's most colorful champions. Hector Camacho's dynamic speed, footwork and power made him a fighter to be reckoned with, but it was his flamboyance and showmanship that ushered in a new era in boxing. The series chronicles his epic battles inside the ring, his struggles with addiction outside of it and the mystery of the double homicide that claimed his life.

programme.title: Tuesday Night Fights Hector Camacho vs. Rusty Derouen
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS revisits some of Hector Camacho's best fights from the legendary USA's Tuesday Night Fights series alongside our new documentary series Macho: The Hector Camacho Story. In this episode Hector 'Macho' Camacho (46-3-0, 20 KO) battles Rusty Derouen (33-6-0, 25 KO) in a 10-round Halbmittel contest from Erie, Pennsylvania, USA.

programme.title: FS MMA Fedor Emelianenko vs. Matt Linland
programme.desc: This week's edition features BODOGFIGHT: Clash of the Nations, taking place from the ICE Palace in St. Petersburg, Russia. The event is headlined by MMA legend Fedor Emelianenko (25-1) taking on UFC Veteran Matt Lindland (20-4). The fight features two of the world's top-ranked fighters in the world, with Emelianenko being considered the sport's top pound-for-pound fighter at the time, and Lindland being an Olympic Greco-Roman Wrestling silver medalist.

programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features a WBC middleweight title bout between Sergio 'Maravilla' Martinez (45-2, 24 KOs) and Paul 'The Punisher' Williams (39-1, 27 KOs) from Boardwalk Hall in Atlantic City, New Jersey, USA, on November 20, 2010.

programme.title: XMA
programme.desc: In this episode, we learn about how the use of motion animation technology can help martial artists learn more efficient ways to put extra power behind their punches and kicks.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best judo of the World Team Championships from Budapest, where we will see history made as it's the first time a new mixed gender team format will be seen.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Bernard Hopkins vs. Winky Wright
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a light heavyweight title contest featuring 47-4-1 Bernard Hopkins and the 51-3-1 Winky Wright, who has not lost a bout in over seven years.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 4 featuring Ikioi, Tamawashi, Takakeisho, and Yoshikaze from the Nagoya basho, 2018.

programme.title: Macho: The Hector Camacho Story
programme.desc: This series takes a hard-hitting look at the rise, fall and untimely death of one of boxing's most colorful champions. Hector Camacho's dynamic speed, footwork and power made him a fighter to be reckoned with, but it was his flamboyance and showmanship that ushered in a new era in boxing. The series chronicles his epic battles inside the ring, his struggles with addiction outside of it and the mystery of the double homicide that claimed his life.

programme.desc: Roly reveals he's expecting a new baby brother or sister, and the Squirrels have questions.

programme.desc: Why do my feet hurt?', Tag asks Duggee. While Duggee has a think, he tells them 'why' is a great question, and the Squirrels are quick to follow up.

programme.desc: Today at Squirrel Club, there are all sorts of comparisons to learn - from small to smallest, hungry to hungriest, and Duggee to Duggiest!

programme.desc: How many siblings does Norrie have? What's Duggee's favourite badge? What does everyone do on Fridays? Squirrel Club has the answers!

programme.desc: A Giant Grandmaster Glitch means BIG trouble for the Giant's Causeway!

programme.desc: When Bluey forgets to put her favourite toy away, Socks grabs it! The kids stage a horsey wedding to distract her, with Dad and Uncle Stripe as the horses!

programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo want everyone to play charades, but Muffin and Socks are too young to understand the rules and Nana must think quickly to keep the game on track.

programme.title: City Confidential (S8) - EP 12

programme.title: The Life & Murder Of Nicole Brown Simpson - EP 3
programme.desc: After Nicoleâ€™s murder, OJ's behaviour grows increasingly erratic and bizarre. Placed squarely in the LAPD's crosshairs as the prime suspect, he leads them on a slow-speed chase down the 405.

programme.title: The Life & Murder Of Nicole Brown Simpson - EP 4
programme.desc: OJâ€™s behaviour sparks a media frenzy, culminating in a high-profile trial. His ongoing violence raises concerns about what happened to Sydney and Justin.

programme.title: Solar System (S1) - EP 1

programme.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls (S1) - EP 6

programme.title: Rare Survivors - China's Iconic Wildlife (S1) - EP 1
programme.desc: Mist swirls around the base of Shanghai's skyline. From the city, tigers and monkeys seem as unreal and distant as dragons and mermaids emerging through the mist. Yet they exist as rare survivors in an extraordinary and diverse landscape. From snow leopards to wild horses, and from alligators to elephants, China's iconic wildlife is a lot more than just pandas.

programme.title: Built To Survive S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: Phil Breslin ventures into Australia's notorious swamp country where he encounters the speedy freshwater crocodile, the predatory barramundi and the world's largest reptile, the saltwater crocodile.

programme.title: Great Barrier Reef: A Living Treasu S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: Stretching 2,300 kilometres down the northeast coast of Queensland, the reef is home to over 900 islands each with their own unique biology and fauna.

programme.title: The Cook Up With Adam Liaw S5 - EP 40
programme.desc: It's Easy Entertaining, and Adam, Indigenous Culinary Consultant Sam May and comedian Frida Deguise help put a stop to weeknight potluck panic.

programme.title: Australian Story (2024) - EP 2
programme.desc: When the senseless death of teenager Cassius Turvey ignited fury across the nation, his mother Mechelle responded with a call for peace and unity.

programme.title: Alone Australia S3 - EP 2
programme.desc: In a battle against time, the survivalists hurry to establish shelters or catch food before their energy reserves run out.

programme.title: News Breakfast (2025) - EP 256
programme.desc: Start your day with the latest overnight developments, breaking news and the day's top stories. Emma Rebellato and Olivia Caisley bring you news and interviews, joined by Luke Siddham Dundon, Johnson Raela and Claudia Long.

programme.title: News Breakfast: Extended (2025) - EP 18
programme.desc: An extended News Breakfast over summer, as Emma Rebellato and Olivia Caisley bring you the morning's top stories and interviews, joined by Luke Siddham Dundon with news, Johnson Raela with sport and Claudia Long on weather.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings (2025) - EP 256
programme.desc: Stay in the know with what's happening this Christmas Eve. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news so you can stay connected this morning and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Ruby Cornish.

programme.title: Boyer Lecture Series (2025) - EP 4
programme.desc: James Curran, author and professor, argues that the US Presidency holds advantages for Australia, if we are brave enough to take them, and to confront possible changes in our historic alliance, in his speech 'Trump's Gift'.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon (2025) - EP 256
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Ruby Cornish brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Headliners S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Musician and campaigner Elly-May Barnes joins rockstars Ella Hooper, Tim Rogers and Jimmy Barnes, to transform a group of musicians who have never met before into two bands set to play at an Australian music festival.

programme.title: That Christmas
programme.desc: Eleven poignant, funny and powerful stories about Christmas like no other, told by the people who lived through them. Some of the storytellers are familiar faces, some are new.

programme.title: Creative Types With Virginia Trioli S1 - EP 6
programme.desc: Patricia Piccinini, the artist who creates strange creatures from the frontiers of science and technology, tells us of the future that is already here and why she is compelled to "create the worlds" that live in her mind.

programme.title: Stuff The British Stole S1 - EP 6
programme.desc: For well over a century the remains of Yagan, an Indigenous Noongar warrior from WA, were missing in the UK. The search for Yagan and the fight to bring him home is one of history's wildest detective stories. (Final)

programme.title: Alone Australia S3 - EP 3
programme.desc: A triumphant catch starves of the hunger of one survivalist, but as the adrenaline of the adventure fades, can the others pivot their strategies to bring in food?

programme.title: Back Roads S10 - EP 8
programme.desc: We return to Eugowra, one of the first towns Back Roads visited when the pandemic hit in 2020. Two years later, it was almost wiped out by a flash flood. Heather discovers how they survived and what's driving their recovery.

programme.title: The Season S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: The harvest is coming to an end and everyone is getting ready to go home. As Mama Sue helps the workers pack, she is sad to see them leave. Jojo returns to Vanuatu with a new plan, while Steve gets an unexpected surprise.

programme.title: A Pacific Christmas
programme.desc: Celebrate Christmas with the Pasefika Vitoria Choir as they share harmonies, carols and cultural stories from across the region. A joyful, festive special hosted by ABC Radio Australia's, Sosefina Fuamoli.

programme.title: The Observers

The Observers are volunteers, and are not paid for their contributions.

programme.title: Girl Power - EP 609
programme.desc: Invite stylish men from all over the world to share cultural differences, feelings and values, and life experiences with Taiwanese!

programme.title: Hello Doctor - EP 1750
programme.desc: The program invites doctors from different fields to talk about big and small things about doctors, break the stereotype of doctors and provide audiences with information on medical health from a relaxed and pleasant perspective!

programme.title: The Queen Show - EP 95
programme.desc: Sharp Queen Li Jing and Absurd Master Shen Yulin

programme.title: Dee Girl's Talk - EP 407
programme.desc: Hosted by Dee Hsu, the most queenly artist in the entertainment industry, and partnered with the humorous assistant host Patrick, each episode invites many of the most popular and topical artists and Internet celebrities to appear on the show. Through Dee Hsu Her profound and spicy hosting skills stirred up unparalleled "laughter" with the guests.

programme.title: No.57 Dream Boulevard - EP 1862
programme.desc: More professional, richer, and more diversified car model information is shared with the audience.

programme.title: ShinyFoodDiary - EP 82
programme.desc: The host visits various places in a walking and themed way, focusing on what is most fashionable among young people nowadays.Check in on FB and IG to create new highlights and online clicks, not only delicious food, but also in-depth introduction.Introduce the cultural customs and festivals of various places.

programme.title: All Star Quiz Show - EP 1167
programme.desc: The puzzle reality program, with the curator Sam Tseng as the knowledge gatekeeper, tests every artist star who comes to challenge the Jiugongge puzzle game. If you want to conquer the Jiugongge level, through creative association, logical reasoning, and rational analysis, you will have the opportunity to obtain wisdom stars and take away the dream prize.

programme.title: Big Boys Club
programme.desc: Each episode of Big Boys Club invites singers, artistes as well as people from different walks of life as guests onto the show, participating in relaxed interviews and discussing current trends.

programme.title: OMG, Your Honour - EP 17
programme.desc: Two distinguished criminal barristers, Fan Siu Yu and Yiu Lik Hung, have been rivals since law school. Despite being classmates, their personalities and approaches to law are very different, leading to years of personal and professional conflict.

programme.title: Homeland Guardian & What's On Today - EP 6
programme.desc: Legendary Hong Kong police officer Ho Ho Fai, known for his role as one of the Three Tigers, faces a dramatic fall from grace after a failed mission. Joining the Special Duties Unit, he and his team fight to uncover and thwart a plot against Hong Kongâ€˜s financial system.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2708
programme.desc: Hung Shu-Kan owns a logistics business. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. His eldest daughter has moved abroad, but his second youngest daughter, Yuek-Shui, is still single. She and her little sister Sum-Yue often squabble, putting their father in a dilemma.

programme.title: Scoop 2025

programme.title: In Bed With A Stranger - EP 13
programme.desc: Ching-tin feels somewhat depressed as she finds out Man-sum is getting married, so she decides to achieve her life goals by dedicating herself to work. She also wants to improve her relationship with her son Chi-hin. Cheung-sing finds out Christy is leaving Hong Kong, so he tells Ching-tin to promptly take Alton to the airport.

programme.title: Golden City (Ep 751-800) VVD Mandarin - EP 783
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Gods Of Honour - EP 27
programme.desc: NAR JAR (CHAN HO MAN, BENNY) was a â€˜Fire masterâ€™ in his previous life. He was killed by LEE CHING (YUEN WAH). After reincarnation, he ironically becomes CHINGâ€™s third son. He is very much affected by his old memories and cannot forgive his father. CHING also keeps his distance from him because of his exotic nature and eventually sends him away with excuses. Luckily, he is saved by some kind people and becomes a General when he is still a teenager.

programme.title: Madam Cutie On Duty - EP 16
programme.desc: FA PING (Priscilla Wong), who was often made fun of by the others for being ugly during her childhood, underwent cosmetic surgery in the wake of an accident. Ever since then, she has been firmly convinced that an attractive appearance has a significant impact on one's life, and remains the same after joining the police.

programme.title: I've Got The Power - EP 12
programme.desc: Chung Hau-nin (Ruco Chan), Kiu Yeuk-lam (Natalie Tong) and Ko Yung (Joel Chan) are complete strangers. After surviving a traffic accident, they astonishingly gain mystical power!_x000D__x000D_Hau-nin and Ding Shuk-man (Moon Lau) are a loving young married couple. Hau-nin intends to use his mystical power for his own benefit, but he knows how to use his mystical power to help other people as he is influenced by Yeuk-lam, who has a righteous character.

programme.title: Battle Against Evil, The - EP 13
programme.desc: General LI (TONG, MICHAEL) of the Chor Kingdom and wizard CHAI (CHAN HO, MOSES) were colleagues under the same mentor. LI killed CHAR when he found out that CHAR was having an affair with his wife SUKI (LEUNG TSAND, JADE). SUKI was ashamed of her affair, so she committed suicide. After she died, CHAI was furious and killed LI. He used bad magic to turn LIâ€™s spirit into a cloud of hatred in order to prevent him from reincarnation.

programme.title: At The Threshold Of An Era - EP 32
programme.desc: The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60â€™s in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities. With the help from his best friend MA CHI KEUNG (Kwok Chun On), TIM took over an incomplete village housing development.

programme.desc: Chung Hau-nin (Ruco Chan), Kiu Yeuk-lam (Natalie Tong) and Ko Yung (Joel Chan) are complete strangers. After surviving a traffic accident, they astonishingly gain mystical power!_x000D__x000D_Hau-nin and Ding Shuk-man (Moon Lau) are a loving young married couple. Hau-nin intends to use his mystical power for his own benefit, but he knows how to use his mystical power to help other people as he is influenced by Yeuk-lam, who has a righteous character.

programme.title: Battle Against Evil, The - EP 14
programme.desc: General LI (TONG, MICHAEL) of the Chor Kingdom and wizard CHAI (CHAN HO, MOSES) were colleagues under the same mentor. LI killed CHAR when he found out that CHAR was having an affair with his wife SUKI (LEUNG TSAND, JADE). SUKI was ashamed of her affair, so she committed suicide. After she died, CHAI was furious and killed LI. He used bad magic to turn LIâ€™s spirit into a cloud of hatred in order to prevent him from reincarnation.

programme.title: At The Threshold Of An Era - EP 34
programme.desc: The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60â€™s in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities. With the help from his best friend MA CHI KEUNG (Kwok Chun On), TIM took over an incomplete village housing development.

programme.title: At The Threshold Of An Era - EP 35
programme.desc: The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60â€™s in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities. With the help from his best friend MA CHI KEUNG (Kwok Chun On), TIM took over an incomplete village housing development.

programme.title: Gods Of Honour - EP 28
programme.desc: NAR JAR (CHAN HO MAN, BENNY) was a â€˜Fire masterâ€™ in his previous life. He was killed by LEE CHING (YUEN WAH). After reincarnation, he ironically becomes CHINGâ€™s third son. He is very much affected by his old memories and cannot forgive his father. CHING also keeps his distance from him because of his exotic nature and eventually sends him away with excuses. Luckily, he is saved by some kind people and becomes a General when he is still a teenager.

programme.title: Madam Cutie On Duty - EP 17
programme.desc: FA PING (Priscilla Wong), who was often made fun of by the others for being ugly during her childhood, underwent cosmetic surgery in the wake of an accident. Ever since then, she has been firmly convinced that an attractive appearance has a significant impact on one's life, and remains the same after joining the police.

TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities. programme.title: At The Threshold Of An Era - EP 37
programme.desc: The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60â€™s in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities. With the help from his best friend MA CHI KEUNG (Kwok Chun On), TIM took over an incomplete village housing development.

programme.title: Let's Make Laugh
programme.desc: When a young housewife's debt-ridden, philandering husband leaves her with a mountain of tax debts, a security guard is hired by the tax authority to guard the assets, but he starts falling for her instead.

programme.title: Romantic Dream
programme.desc: Dino meets his dream girl Mandy and falls in love with her at first sight. However, she disappears suddenly and he only sees her again after nine years, when she is already married. To overcome the pain of losing his love, Dino finds a guru with supernatural power to make him meet Mandy in his dream.

programme.title: I Love Lolanto
programme.desc: Lolanto, a playboy, is injured and meets the daughter of a tycoon, Man, in the hospital. Man is mentally retarded and makes friends easily with Lolanto hence Man's father hires him to take care of her. However, as Man goes through treatments and recovers, her feelings for Lolanto also changes...

programme.title: Sex Beyond The Grave
programme.desc: During World War II, a singer was raped and killed by Master Tao during her escape, with all her valuables stolen as well. Since then, the Tao's house became haunted. Years later, Master Tao's descendant sells the house to a young couple to pay off a massive gambling debt, but the couple soon discover that it is haunted by the vengeful spirit...

programme.title: Teenage Dreamers
programme.desc: Ting Ting is a student in an all-girl high school. She tries out for the school's stage production of Romeo and Juliet with an all-boy school and promptly falls for the lead, Jackson. While Ting Ting is swept away by the excitement of her first love, Jackson turns out to be more of a player than a partner.

programme.title: Fat Choi Spirit
programme.desc: Andy is a mahjong master who is very popular in the neighbourhood. However, after being cursed by his ex-girlfriend, Andy always experiences bad luck when playing mahjong. Can he finally dodge this streak of bad luck?

programme.title: Kung Fu Mahjong 2
programme.desc: Fanny appears to be an ordinary housewife but is in fact a mahjong expert. Deeply in love with her husband, she loses to a seductive woman, Curvy, both on the mahjong table and in competing for her husband's love. With the help from her mahjong master, Fanny vows to take on Curvy in the Mahjong King tournament!

programme.title: It's a Wonderful Life
programme.desc: Hong Kong tycoon Ren Da Kuan takes care of his family that spans four generations, yet his three sons grapple with their own challenges. Everything changes when his daughter returns from studying in France with her friend Roberto. Roberto brings a wave of transformation to the Ren family, sparking new hope and opportunities for all.

programme.title: The Story of Woo Viet
programme.desc: Former Vietnamese veteran Woo Viet arrives a refugee camp in Hong Kong and meets his pen pal Quan. Subsequently, he encounters Shum Ching, with whom he attempts to flee to the US. However, the pair end up stranded in Manila's Chinatown, where at the hands of the local triads Woo becomes a hired killer, while Shum is forced into prostitution.

programme.title: Mr Vampire II
programme.desc: Grave-robbing archaeologists unearth a family of preserved vampires and plan to sell them on the black market. However, they accidentally break the paper spells that had kept the vampires immobilized during transport. The vampires escape, but a local herbalist Lin is soon on their trail, determined to destroy them.

programme.title: Golden Chicken
programme.desc: Ah Kam, a seasoned prostitute, gets locked inside an ATM vestibule with a thief. Both discover they are ill-fated in life and Ah Kam starts telling him her life story as a prostitute, from a teenage hooker to a PR girl in an upscale club in her thirties, as well as being a strip dancer, bar girl and masseuse.

programme.title: Loving You
programme.desc: A bad-tempered, womanizing cop who always neglects his wife is shot in the head as he hunts down a drug dealer. Though he miraculously survives, he must depend on his wife to nurse him back to health. During the recovery, he begins to re-evaluate his life and repair the damages of his broken marriage.

programme.title: Law Or Justice
programme.desc: Lawyer Yip defends a rapist and gets him acquitted. Yip's boyfriend Fong, a police inspector, knows he is guilty and despises Yip for not upholding justice. The victim's sister takes revenge by spiking the rapist's drink but is raped instead. This puts the rapist back in court. Will Yip choose to uphold law or justice this time?

programme.title: Royal Tramp II
programme.desc: The leader of Dragon clan, Long Er, helps General Wu to overthrow Emperor Kang Xi. However, Long Er is betrayed by General Wu and is rescued by Xiao Bao. As a result, she bestows her virginity and martial arts power to Xiao Bao to fight against Wu. At the same time, Xiao Bao fortuitously unveils the hidden treasures from "The Sutra of 42 Chapters".

programme.title: Hong Kong Hong Kong
programme.desc: After moving to Hong Kong, illegal immigrant Mang has no choice but to live in cramped quarters with male migrants who abuse her. In order to attain Hong Kong residency and a better life, she agrees to marry a lonely old carpenter. After her marriage, Mang crosses paths again with her ex-lover, and the two develop a passionate affair...

programme.title: All's Well End's Well 97
programme.desc: Mr Lo has three sons, Leung, Fay and Kung; and a daughter-in-law, Eliza. While they seem like a normal family, their relationships need mending. Leung and Fay play a prank on their brother Kung on his birthday by falsely claiming that he has won the lottery. This sets off a chain reaction of funny mishaps that finally brings the family together.

programme.title: Prince Charming
programme.desc: Chen Li Pin, the nerdy son of a business tycoon, and his friend seek love in Hawaii. Returning home in disappointment, they accidentally find themselves in a messy identity swap. It is at this time that Chen falls for a beautiful girl May, who thinks he is a company chauffeur...

programme.title: The Illegal Immigrant
programme.desc: This is a gritty and realistic Chinatown tale about the life of a Chinese illegal immigrant and his journey in New York. He is looking for a fake marriage with a girl so as to gain the right of abode there. Despite all the hardships and misfortunes, he tries to cope with life and reach for his dreams.

programme.title: Let's Make Laugh II
programme.desc: Bodyguard Ah Sun is sent to protect his boss' son, only to meet and fall in love with his mistress, the gorgeous Joey. As love blossoms between the two, the powerful boss finds out and all hell breaks loose!

programme.title: PTU
programme.desc: When OCTB (Organized Crime And Triad Bureau) officer, Sergeant Lo Sa, loses his police revolver to four triad young thugs, he seeks help from Sergeant Mike Ho of the PTU (Police Tactical Unit) to find his lost revolver. Ho and his patrolling PTU team has until dawn to recover the gun and clean up the mess.

programme.title: The Eye
programme.desc: Mun undergoes a cornea transplant to correct her blindness, but ends up gaining more than the gift of sight. She shockingly realises that she is seeing another woman instead of herself whenever she looks into a mirror. Recalling that things changed ever since her cornea was replaced, Mun vows to uncover the truth behind her strange vision...

programme.title: Mr Vampire
programme.desc: Taoist priest Kou is assigned to re-bury a rich man, in the hope that the new tomb will bring further prosperity. When the corpse turns into a vampire and wreaks havoc in the village, his disciples are also hurt by the vampire and possessed by a female ghost respectively. How can Kou save his disciples and hunt down the vampire at the same time?

programme.title: Hong Kong Playboys
programme.desc: Sheng is a rich playboy who lives a carefree and fun life with the ladies, until his mother decides that he should get married. Up against other lady killers in his quest to find Miss Right, Sheng must decide what he wants.

programme.title: Man Wanted 3
programme.desc: Street kid Dong idolizes Mongkok triad leader Pu Jun and inadvertently joins his gang. When rival Xi Yang seizes control by illicit means, Pu Jun decides to take him down. At the same time, Pu Jun uncovers Dong as a police undercover and banishes him, but Dong sheds his undercover identity to join Pu Jun to seek revenge against Xi Yang.

programme.title: Everlasting Love
programme.desc: Young intern doctor Eric meets Pei Jun and quickly falls in love with her, unaware that she works as a hostess in a night club. Despite their social differences, can their love story defy the odds and lead to a happily ever after?

programme.title: Love on Delivery
programme.desc: A delivery boy Yin wants to impress his dream girl Li, so he enrols in a martial arts course to learn strange moves. Being timid, Yin saves Li while wearing a Garfield mask but the credit is stolen by Karate Master, Liu. To prove himself and win Li back, Yin defeats Liu in the ring with his unique martial arts move "Invincible Wind and Fire Spin".

programme.title: Mr. Virgin
programme.desc: Mr. Virgin is a romantic comedy about a twenty-nine year-old man Chao Yu-ting (Alfred Chang) who has seemingly been cursed. He becomes paranoid when a Feng Shui expert tells him it will be unlucky for him to marry before the age of thirty... so comical chaos line the days up to his next birthday!

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: Ma Wing Jing and his brother arrive in Shanghai to make their fortune. Befriending a powerful mobster Tam, Ma is given his nightclub when he saves Tam's life. Ma's fortune rises but he must overcome the corruption and violence to survive.

programme.title: City of Desire
programme.desc: Sister 13 returns to Macau after 17 years to succeed her father's underground empire, the prostitution business. She tries to stop their exploitation of the sex workers, but Macau's economy flourished after the handover, propelling the prostitution and gambling businesses. The city is blinded by desire and Sister 13 can do nothing to help...

programme.title: The Bride With White Hair
programme.desc: As Wudang disciple Zhuo Yi Hang confronts the Demon Palace, he reunites with Lian Ni Shang, the woman who once saved him, and their love reignites. Lian, a disciple of the Demon Palace, endures torment to be with Zhuo but is shattered when he accidentally injures her. A fierce battle between good and evil unfolds!

programme.title: Love and Let Love!
programme.desc: Cliff proposes to his girlfriend Terry but is killed in a car accident before she says "yes". Terry is devastated and inconsolable. When Cliff's ghost returns, they seem to go back to their good old days. However, Cliff is determined to help Terry get over his death and start anew.

programme.title: Mist Over Dream Lake
programme.desc: A young girl Chen is sent away by her parents who are going through divorce, to stay with the Chang's. On the Chang's farm, she meets their two sons, the youngest daughter and a young artist, and spends a summer with them that she will never forget.

programme.title: Duel For Gold
programme.desc: Six swordsmen, including two sisters and their husbands, a ranger and a security man, are trying to steal a million gold taels from the Fu Lai Treasury House, not knowing that one of them is actually an undercover hero. In their quest, they have to double-cross and outwit one another...

programme.title: Forbidden Tales of Two Cities
programme.desc: Li Han-hsiang wrote and directed this charming and fascinating comedy, Forbidden Tales Of Two Cities. The two cities in the picture are Macau, where a love quartet is a morally-unsound source for sexual entertainment; and Hong Kong, where a woman enters a gambler's apartment to find four shackles hanging from his ceiling to aid in kinky activities.

programme.title: The Brave Archer 3
programme.desc: Guo Jing and Huang Rong go to Iron Palm Peak to search for the Book of Wumu. The chief of Iron Palm discovers their visit, and seriously injures Huang. It seems only the Southern Emperor Duan can heal her, but will Huang be healed in time?

programme.title: The Mighty One
programme.desc: Lung seeks five volumes of a renowned Kung Fu manual to gain invincibility. When he believes a martial arts school master possesses the volumes, he kills him and his daughter but leaves behind a young brother and sister. Years later, Lung loses two volumes and starts another bloody hunt but each attempt is interrupted by two mysterious warriors...

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung and the Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung meets a famous courtesan in Suzhou and in order to spend as much time as possible with her, he builds a direct underground tunnel into the Forbidden City. The emperor's sudden appearances through this direct access shock his people but it is also at this time that he helps the needy and cracks the gambling business in Suzhou.

programme.title: Clan Of The White Lotus
programme.desc: The head of White Lotus Clan, Lo, is a highly skilled martial artist who supports the Qing government and helps destroy the rebellion group. Hung from Shaolin who kills Lo's brother, is being hunted and hides in another rebel Hu's house. The clan attacks at night killing Hu and his sister, but Hung manages to get Hu's pregnant wife to safety.

programme.title: The Mirror and the Lichee
programme.desc: The curious title in this Huangmei Opera romance refers to the two props that signal a happy beginning between a scholar and a local beauty. The scholar polishes mirrors so as to be closer to his love, who signals her approval by tossing him some lichees. From that point on the course of their love becomes rocky, complete with murder and suicide.

programme.title: The Delightful Forest
programme.desc: The legendary hero Wu Sung is sent to a prison in Meng province after murdering his adulterous sister-in-law and her lover. While in prison, the officer Shih En spares Wu the humiliating baton punishment. Owing Shih a favour, Wu decides to help Shih get his restaurant back at all costs when it was forcefully taken over by a local thug.

programme.title: Two Con Men
programme.desc: Two Con Men is a wonderfully twisted, pseudo-romantic comedy in the vein of "Robin Hood" meets "The Sting". Starring Liang Tien as Clever Chan and Chang Ying (who's done over 400 films) as Tricky Ching, it's the age-old competition between a rookie con artist versus the ultimate, experienced flimflam man. It's a game Chen cannot afford to lose, because people's lives - including his own, hang in the balance of good versus evil.

programme.title: The Avenging Eagle
programme.desc: Qi Ming Xing, an assassin of the Iron Boat Clan, decides to quit the clan. When hunted by the clan, he is saved by Swordsman Zhuo Yi Fan. Zhuo accidentally discovers that Qi is the killer of his wife, but forgives him after knowing Qi's guilt over her death. The two finally team up to destroy the evil clan.

programme.title: Pale Passion
programme.desc: Fa is an obsessive man who loves his wife Ah Hsia but is easily jealous and abuses her. When she leaves him one day, Fa hooks up with another woman, Hsing. A deadly triangle develops when Fa runs into Ah Hsia again and decides to win her back...

programme.title: Invincible Shaolin
programme.desc: An evil Qing general comes up with a plan to rid the Shaolin masters once and for all. He invites three Northern Shaolin experts to fight against three Southern Shaolin disciples. After the contest, the general secretly kills the Southerners and places the blame on the Northerners. This leads to in-fighting between both Shaolin schools.

programme.title: Double Bliss
programme.desc: Dong and Chu plan to get married but their families who are lifelong rivals, disapproved. They decide to fake suicide and eventually get both of their parents to settle their differences and approve the marriage. Concurrently, a record company announces that they will release Dong's songs, leading to double bliss for the couple.

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: Threatened by the Yuan who are closing in to rule the whole of China, a band of Song survivors band together to save their prime minister. This bold and fearless heroes fighting for their cause are led by international star, Lo Lieh (Glass Tears, Killer Clans) and Shi Szu (Lovers Destiny), who must fight their way out of trap after trap. But they can't escape them all, and eventually the two end up in prison... it is either death or a fight to the end!

programme.title: Call of the Sea
programme.desc: A young fisherman, Chin Hu is in love with his childhood friend Hsiao Yu. However, the only son of a town bully lusts after Hsiao Yu's beauty and tries all possible ways to approach her. Chin Hu protects another woman from the bully one day, leading Hsiao Yu to misunderstand him and suspect that they are having an affair...

programme.title: Men From The Monastery
programme.desc: At the end of the Ming Dynasty, Wu San Gui betrays his people to the Qing officials and recruits fighters from all backgrounds. Members from Wudan and Ermei are the first to yield and collude with local bullies. When they start attacking the Shaolin Monastery, its most famous disciples have to band together and fight against the enemies.

programme.title: Hong Kong Nocturne
programme.desc: This joyous, raucous, & colorful tunefest showcases the little seen dancing talents of celebrated kung-fu swordswoman Cheng Pei-Pei, as one of 3 girls dancing their way to the top.

programme.title: Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre 2
programme.desc: Only by bringing together the powerful Heaven Sword and the mighty Dragon Sabre can six martial arts sects struggling for supremacy be saved in this thrilling sequel to Chu Yuan's original hit.

programme.title: The Shepherd Girl
programme.desc: In this musical drama, Hsiu Hsiu, a beautiful shepherd girl, falls in love with a handsome boatman Ta Lung. However, she cannot afford to marry him because of her father's towering debt from gambling. To complicate the matter, a rival suitor promises to pay off all her father's debts on one condition: that Hsiu Hsiu marries him...

programme.title: Asia-pol
programme.desc: Asiapol agent Yang Ming Xuan trails a shipment of contraband gold being delivered to gang leader, George Eaton. He enlists the help of a Chinese woman who is trying to avenge her sister and narrowly escapes several deadly traps as he closes in on Eaton's location. This spy film is loosely inspired by the James Bond movies.

programme.title: Little Hero
programme.desc: An orphan, Little Bastard is taken on and trained as a fighter by a hermit. When Little Bastard grows up, he feels he is old enough to go out and look for his parents. Luckily for him, he befriends a beggar, Hsiao Yi, who being street-wise, manages to help him find his family, but somehow gets into trouble with the gang.

programme.title: Secret Service of the Imperial Court
programme.desc: Zhao Bu Fan is the sergeant of the government's secret police. Wang is a cruel and ruthless eunuch who takes over the Emperor's ruling power and leads the team of secret agents. After witnessing the atrocities committed by Eunuch Wang, Sergeant Zhao decides to defect but ends up being hunted by his friends, comrades and even his father.

programme.title: Flying Guillotine 2
programme.desc: In a time of anti-Manchu sentiment, Emperor Yong Zheng employs his ruthless Blood Hound Corps to silence any dissenters. Only one man and his signature weapon, The Flying Guillotine, stand in their way.

programme.title: Crazy Shaolin Disciples
programme.desc: The story revolves around three lay disciples of the Shaolin Temple: Fang Shi Yu, Hong Xi Guan, and Hu Hui Qian. Monk Jie instructs them in martial arts, but their frequent competitions with fellow disciple Wu Qing spark rivalries. The once serene Shaolin Temple is plunged into chaos, yet even the abbot cannot help but be amused by their antics.

programme.title: Heroes Two
programme.desc: Shaolin disciple Hong escapes from the burning temple after it is attacked by the Qing army and is badly wounded. He is handed over to the Qing soldiers by Fang as he mistakes Hong for a bandit. When Fang realizes his mistakes, he tries all ways to help Hong escape so that they can team up to fight the Qing army together.

programme.title: Passing Flickers
programme.desc: This film is an amusing insider's look at the Hong Kong film industry and is based on Director Li Han Hsiang's popular newspaper column recounting his work at Shaw Brothers. The collection of some of his funniest and most surreal film musings of the era, filled with behind-the-scene asides, this is a must-see for any Hong Kong cinema aficionado!

programme.title: The Trail of the Broken Blade
programme.desc: After avenging his father's death by assassinating a high official, Li Yue disappears into hiding as a fugitive. His fiancee enlists a swordsman-who secretly loves her-to search for him, unaware that the bandit Xiao Mei has also fallen for Li Yue. Their intertwined love quadrangle explores themes of sacrifice, devotion and selfless love.

programme.title: Return of the Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This sequel makes for more bittersweet laughs and heart-wrenching misfortune, as Ah Niu gets out of the jail to find his true love becoming the wife of an abusive husband, and his uncle further exploits his naive nature.

programme.title: Shao Kang's War Room
programme.desc: Shao Kang's War Room is a Talkshow hosted by Zhao Shao Kang. This programme combines TVBS News source and Mr. Zhao's rich political and media background, to analyse important news deeply.

programme.title: Global Golden Line
programme.desc: It is the first professional reality car show, providing concrete evaluations of cars on the market, the deepest appreciation for classic cars, the hottest trends in the motoring world, and analysis of the latest auto tech trends.

programme.title: Chop Chop Show
programme.desc: The show invites younger generations to talk about relationship, career, entertainment, current affairs, and all the other popular topics that they care and complain about.

programme.title: Citizens' Subjects
programme.desc: Citizens' Subjects utilizes the perspective of Taiwan people and Taiwan events to tell the stories of Taiwan. It takes a light-hearted, humorous approach to interpreting current affairs.

programme.title: Queen
programme.desc: From makeup, skincare, hairstyle, clothing, horoscopes, parenting, to travel, all kinds of fashion-related topics are presented in the program. Pauline Lan leads dozens of professionals and experts across categories to offer the best fashion insights and tips.

programme.title: Global Focus
programme.desc: Bringing you the latest political, economy, information technology and breaking news around the world.

programme.title: All About Health
programme.desc: How well do you know your body? What should you eat to be healthy and energetic? Are health tips available online reliable? Tune in to this programme as the hosts give you all the answers!

programme.title: Shao Kang's War Room
programme.desc: Shao Kang's War Room is a Talkshow hosted by Zhao Shao Kang. This programme combines TVBS News source and Mr. Zhao's rich political and media background, to analyse important news deeply.

programme.title: Queen
programme.desc: From makeup, skincare, hairstyle, clothing, horoscopes, parenting, to travel, all kinds of fashion-related topics are presented in the program. Pauline Lan leads dozens of professionals and experts across categories to offer the best fashion insights and tips.

programme.title: Chop Chop Show

programme.title: Super Taste: 48 Hour Burning Desire!
